description: Smallest power of 2 whose decimal expansion contains n.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := (k = 0; While[ !MatchQ[ IntegerDigits[2^k], {___, Sequence @@ IntegerDigits[n], ___}], k++]; 2^k); Table[a[n], {n, 1, 30}](* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 30 2011 *)
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (isInfixOf)a030001 n = head $ filter ((show n `isInfixOf`) . show) a000079_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 02 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
